outputs.output_descr:
Goal: To achieve a strengthened and more effective health delivery system.
Target Group/Beneficiaries:
Health workers, communities and people affected/infected by HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis and malaria.
Strategies:
Provide long-term comprehensive human resource for health plan, distribute HRH equitably and create incentive package to retain key staff, make results-oriented performance as primary basis for improved remuneration, promote the achievement of full performance of health workers, improve M&E system through strengthening HMIS.
Planned Activities:
Provide retention scheme allowances
donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
